name: .UFDX
summary: Learn about .UFDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a UFDX file while opening or editing a case in Cellebrite Physical Analyzer (Windows). For example, while opening a case, select Add â†’ Load extraction on the Load evidence screen to load a UFD file.
You can also open a UFDX file with MOBILedit Forensic Express (Windows) or Oxygen Forensics Detective (Windows).
